Reviews.Content: SpecsModesWCDMA 850 / 1900 / 2100GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900Weight  4.41 oz  (125 g)Dimensions  4.83" x 2.52" x 0.41"  (123 x 64 x 10.4 mm)Battery  Talk: 5.8 hours max.  (350 minutes)Standby: 340 hours max.  (14.2 days)1500 mAh, RemovableDisplay  Type: OLED (Full-Color)Resolution: 480 x 800 pixelsDisplay: 4"  diagonalColors: 16.7 million (24-bit)Samsung "Super AMOLED"OS / Platform  Androidversion 2.1, upgradeable to 2.2Processor  1 GHz Samsung Hummingbird Cortex A8Memory  16 GB internal storage, raw hardwareFCC ID  A3LSGHI897 » (Approved Jun 11, 2010)VideoCamera  Resolution: 5+ megapixelauto-focus, face focus, smile or blink trigger, anti-shake, panorama functonsDLNA  YesVideo Capture  Resolution: 720p HDFeaturesGPS / LocationType: A-GPSwith LBS, turn-by-turn navigationAccessibilityDigital TTY/TDD  YesHearing Aid Compatible  Rating: M3 (mostly compatible)Multiple Languages  Languages Supported: English, Spanish, French, German, ItalianAlertsVibrate  YesConnectivityBluetooth  Supported Profiles: HSP 1.2, HFP 1.5, OPP, FTP, PBA, A2DP 1.2, AVRCversion 3.0USB  built-in micro-USB connectorWi-Fi  Version(s): 802.11 b,g,nContactsRinger ID  YesVoice Dialing  Type: Speaker-independent (automatic)CustomizationReal-Music Ringers  YesData & NetworkHigh-Speed Data  Technology: HSPA 7.2WAP / Web BrowserBrowser Software: Android browser (WebKit-based)InputPredictive Text Entry  SwypeSide Keys  volume on left / lock on rightTouch Screen  Type: Capacitivemulti-touch, handwriting recognitionMemoryMemory Card Slot  Card Type: microSD (TransFlash)up to at least 16 GBMessagingEmail Client  YesText Messaging Templates  YesMusicHeadphone Jack (3.5mm)VoiceSpeaker Phone  Yes

Reviews.Title: Old phone, Great Functionality
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Medrano-Palomo
Reviews.Content: While the mobile OS on the phone is out dated, the phone hasn't lost it's functionality. It still has the Android market app store and some apps can't be downloaded because of the OS but if all you need is a simple phone that works great with calls, text, and email, this phone will get the job done while having a sleek and slim profile and fairly decent screen resolution.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked phone Locked
Reviews.Author: Jaime Martinez
Reviews.Content: I bought and paid for a unlocked pone, but i received a locked pone instead.. I will not work in other countries..Sorry.. They do not know what they sell..

Reviews.Title: Great Galaxy smartphone
Reviews.Author: GM Phones 4 Less
Reviews.Content: This is a great smartphone that is easy to use, lightweight, and has a long battery life. The power/sleep button is on the side, which is odd, but overall a great phone. The processor is fast and it never freezes.

Reviews.Title: I hate this phone
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This phone has so many issues and should be recalled!!!  It overheats, the calls always drop even thought you have service, it freezes at least five times a day, and it will reset some of the options you selected on you phone such as ringtones and folders.  Do not get this phone!!

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Brenda K. Munson
Reviews.Content: Well I recieved the phone in time, arrived in a sealed box.  Having a lot of difficulty with phone calls-  getting service on the phone, dropping calls, crackling noise, difficulty hearing people.  I do not know if it is the phone because it is an unlocked phone or just the service but before when I had my other phone I did not have this difficulty.  I would like to know if others have had the same problem with phones that they have purchased like this one.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Angela Barlow-Walker
Reviews.Content: This was my second phone I purchased.  The first one did not power up.  The second one powered up, but has poor performance.  It drops calls, not able to connect to mobile network, it freezes and not able to make or answer calls.  Poor functionality all the way around.

Reviews.Title: Not Satsified
Reviews.Author: Susan Wheeler
Reviews.Content: The phone was slow and would have to shut it down several times a day just to keep it from freezing

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: Jayla Wilson
Reviews.Content: This product didn't work right. It wouldn't hold charge and wasn't a new phone like it said it was. J

Reviews.Title: don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Joshua French
Reviews.Content: this phone sucks. i spent $100 hoping i would get a phone but i got some block that would crash multiple times daily, did not have a functional speaker, and couldn't call people without pressing the call button 3 times. i'd rather smoke weed

Reviews.Title: I would give this phone a -0
Reviews.Author: Latoya
Reviews.Content: This phone is no good it doesn't upgrade.When u buy something cheap that's what you get.I wouldn't recommend this phone to no one

Reviews.Title: Great phone for a newbie
Reviews.Author: Alexander Corbett
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these on seperate dates, excellent cell phone for newbie and for replacements. Big screen m great funcionality and cheap

Reviews.Title: It May be a great phone...
Reviews.Author: Tessy
Reviews.Content: I didnt mean to rate 1 star... The phone's outward appearance was perfect but I couldn't assess the inner Features because the phone was LOCKED!. I NEEDED UNLOCKED PHONE. But I believe it is a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Horrible experience.
Reviews.Author: Gene Rogers
Reviews.Content: Because it wasn't a new phone when I got it and it had a lot of damage to it and it didn't even come with a charger. I'm not even sure if I got back my money. I sent it back a while ago and haven't received anything about it.

Reviews.Title: purchase of New Samsung Galazy S Captivate
Reviews.Author: Toni
Reviews.Content: I purchased on amazon.com what was suppose to be a New Samsung Galaxy S Captivate. when i received the phone it had bad blemishes and the entire rubber door covering the charging port was missing. There was NOTHING NEW about this phone.  I feel that the description and price online is misleading to munipulate me, the customer into a purchase.

Reviews.Title: great phone overall
Reviews.Author: shirley smith
Reviews.Content: This is a great smartphone that is easy to use, lightweight, and has a long battery life. The power/sleep button is on the side, which is odd, but overall a great phone. The processor is fast and it never freezes.This shipping time was great along with excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: It works great
Reviews.Author: Tabby
Reviews.Content: Because it came early and i is a great working phone and I have no Major problems with it I love it

Reviews.Title: badass phone
Reviews.Author: brice
Reviews.Content: I love this phone it is just the basic galaxy i was looking for especially now that i have it upgraded to firmware 2.3

Reviews.Title: Custermer serves
Reviews.Author: Dakota P House
Reviews.Content: Just got dun talking to a guy and they refuned me my money and thats good because there workers were very rude to me

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: BCBeltran "BCBeltran"
Reviews.Content: I love it but the only problem is that their not unlocked so i have my husband to unlocked them so i can use them international..but now everything works good if i go to Canada.

Reviews.Title: disappointed in Florida
Reviews.Author: Lee Ealy
Reviews.Content: Because it came with no manual it said new and I can't find a case or anything for that matter to go with it unless I order it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wont by another
Reviews.Author: theresa gray
Reviews.Content: No the phone doesn't work properly it keeps turning off the lock screen button don't work when u call some on you can hear them but they can't hear you it was a big mistake

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: laura brenneke
Reviews.Content: Phone is cracked on the side. The speaker to talk to ppl sometimes work and some times u just can't call ppl. Super old had an HTC inspire this compares nothing that its more like a dumb phone .

Reviews.Title: weak, bad reception
Reviews.Author: Narodi
Reviews.Content: disclaimer: didn't buy it on amazon and I live in the middle east.CONS:In my country, the reception couldn't be worse with this phone; I don't get many calls and messages even when reception show good ratings.the speaker is very weak during calls (music volume is ok)the gps never locks and i can never use itIt restarts or turns off many times randomlyPROS:looks nicelite weightbuilt quality is goodvery good screenI was very close to smashing it on concrete walls with the frustration it has caused me

Reviews.Title: The phone is good with some pretty bad issues ..
Reviews.Author: Angela Togni
Reviews.Content: I would give 3 stars for the product but since the delivery was really quick (got the phone within 2 days when it was supposed to arrive 3-5 days) I thought I'll give 4 stars. To the phone: I was really excited to charge it and start figuring out the phone. First of all, I bought this phone to text and call, also to use the GPS because I have my iPhone to do anything else. The Samsung Galaxy S heats up real fast, doesn't matter what you are doing. Since I bought it to make calls, I noticed that if I hang up the phone, it calls the person back right after it and the screen is freezing which means I can't hang up again or do anything. The voice qualitiy is alright, I hear ticking every now and then. The texting is also good, anything else is just bad. So if you are looking for a phone to text and call - buy it, if you are looking for a phone also to listen to music, play games, video chat, take pictures and anything else - go buy an iPhone !! Oh and another thing: The battery life of this Samsung sucks !!! It's so bad, I went to bed and the battery was on 80 something %, after I woke up I wanted to check my phone and it tells me to charge it because the battery is about to die. I wasn't doing anything, nobody called or texted me. There was no use of the phone but the battery was about to die. I was thinking about to send it back to get my money because it's not worth 140$ !!! Oh and when I got the phone I unpacked it full of excitement. The plastic package of the battery and the charger was already open, it's supposed to be closed so I was wondering if someone else had this phone before me? Hmm ..

Reviews.Title: looks good but not sure
Reviews.Author: Silena
Reviews.Content: my friend got the phone and it doesnt work,very angry and disappointed . i spend money for nothing and :(

Reviews.Title: awful experience
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have been terribly disappointed by my last two phone purchases.  In both cases the phones had significant software, download, and connectivity issues.  I will not be purchasing hardware from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Maybe its Luck of the Draw
Reviews.Author: alexpinca "alexpinca"
Reviews.Content: This camera came promptly...looks brand new...and I have had no issues with the phone at all.  The guy at the AT&T; store couldn't believe how cheaply I purchased this phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Ikillez
Reviews.Content: This is a great backup phone to have. It has very nice features and adding a 16 G sd card keeps the phone running smoothly.

WCDMA 850 / 1900 / 2100, GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
5+ megapixel camera with auto-focus, face focus, smile or blink trigger, anti-shake, panorama functions and video capture.
Music player with 3.5mm headset jack.
USB, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity.
Dimensions: 4.83" x 2.52" x 0.41" (123 x 64 x 10.4 mm)
